website_summaries.verdict: A cost-effective entry-level appliance with six stackable drying trays.
pros: Nesting trays save space and increase drying surface
Comes with accessories to whip up fruit strips as well as packs of spice and cure to get started making jerky

customer_reviews.title: Good Dehydrated food made easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and easy use and store. I didn’t need something bulky or complicated and this fits the bill perfectly. So far, I’ve already dried some veggies to store for a rainy day. AND I made a large batch of homemade jerky, which if purchased would have cost mot than this dehydrator. Other that the electricity to run it, from here one out, dehydrating is at no cost. Best of all, I have food for travel, hiking and emergencies available.
customer_reviews.author: Mellor Family

customer_reviews.title: My first dehydrator and i have to say i'm in love with it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like all the controls, the trays are nice and big, comes with everything you need. easy to operate I received it today 8/8 and had it up and running in 15min. I think it was well worth the money. I just want to say the fan or drying part is a little loud, but I put mine in the garage on top of my clothes dryer perfectly. I would recommend this Presto Dehydrator to anyone who asks. Very Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: janice keeler

customer_reviews.title: I bought one and this is my second.
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought just one and now this is my second. I have two running at the same time, they are easy to use and an awesome dehydrator. I bought a more expensive one at first for 3x the price of this and the Presto works better than the expensive one that I purchased. This is an awesome product and I usually dont leave reviews.
customer_reviews.author: nevadasmith

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, But its a little loud
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to make beef jerky at home with the kids. It works very well, and clean up is easy. I just wish it was a little quieter. I just put it in the basement when its running.
customer_reviews.author: William Bray

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Price is right.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean. Clear instructions. It’s a bit noisy but not enough to keep me from using it overnight.
customer_reviews.author: RockinMom

customer_reviews.title: It dehydrates properly.
customer_reviews.text: A bit to much noise but otherwise a very good machine.
customer_reviews.author: John Richardson

customer_reviews.title: not recommended
customer_reviews.text: noisy and thin trays, hardly hold a bigger piece of veggies
customer_reviews.author: Yunbi

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: We are drying herbs from the garden. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for drying Hops
customer_reviews.text: Used to dry hops with low temp for better AA / BA / LU % worked very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the quality for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Hollis E Geary

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the $
customer_reviews.text: Too long to dry fruit, and rather loud. Good ergonomic storage design.
customer_reviews.author: cmahike

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars since everything that i have made has come out great. Any ideas on cleaning would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Swish

customer_reviews.title: Learning!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in drying pepper strips but looking forward to making jerky.
customer_reviews.author: AR Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: The timer is a must have for me. I used it the first time on persimmons. Cut the recommended 1/4 inch. I checked at 6 hours and it was done at 8. It’s a little noisy with the fan, but no worse than turning on the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to dehydrate some of the bumper crop of apples I had this year. The trays are easy to load and the temperature and time settings in the instruction manual produced perfect results. Cleaning up was very easy and the trays store compactly together taking less storage space than my previous dehydrator.
customer_reviews.author: V. Deanne Stegeman

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted two uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year for deer season. Used it one time last year and one time this year and it just randomly quit working! Not very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Robbins

customer_reviews.title: This dehydrator works awesome for drying 3D printer filament.
customer_reviews.text: This dehydrator works awesome for drying 3D printer filament, ABS, PETG even Fiber carbon PETG. It depends on the kind of material and the amount on the spool but usually I leave it about 3-4 hours at 63°C. It's noisy but in my I don't cake too much.
customer_reviews.author: Rockstuar

customer_reviews.title: Great dehydrator but makes a high-pitched, annoying sound
customer_reviews.text: I love this dehydrator in every way except that it makes a high-pitched sound that is annoying my downstairs neighbor. I have read that most all dehydrators are loud but hopefully they don't have this particular sound. I am giving it to a friend whose kitchen is not near the rest of her home. It didn't actually bother me too much when I closed the kitchen door, although I could still hear it a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: V

product_meta.title: Presto Dehydro Electric Food Dehydrator, 6 trays, white and black
product_meta.description: Color:White/Black| Design:DehydratorDehydrate fruits, vegetables, herbs and spices. Great for jerky and fruit rolls too! Dehydrate Food Dehydrator with digital thermostat and timer Includes 6 drying trays, 2 fruit rolls sheets, 2 nonstick mesh screens, and starter packs of jerky spice and cure. Drying trays nest and cord stores in base for compact storage.
feature_bullets: Dehydrates fruits, vegetables, herbs, and spices. Great for jerky and fruit rolls too!
Includes 6 drying trays. Expands to 12 trays; add-on trays sold separately. Drying trays nest and cord stores in base for over a 40% reduction in storage space.

Includes 2 fruit roll sheets for making fruit rolls and strips from fresh, frozen, or canned fruit and 2 flexible nonstick mesh screens for dehydrating foods that get very small when dried and sticky fruits.
Digital thermostat and timer. Temperatures range from 90° to 165°f.
Starter packs of jerky spice and cure included. Make jerky from your choice of meat, poultry, or seafood.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,044 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
